item.title: What I Learned from Reading Books by Sex Workers
item.description: Donate to the Sex Worker Mutual Aid Fund here. So you’ve seen Hustlers? Or maybe you saw Julia Roberts in Pretty Woman and thought ‘hm, that doesn’t seem like such a bad job?’ Wherever your image of sex workers has come from, chances are it probably didn’t come from an actual sex worker. And if recent debates have taught us anything about self-representation, it’s that it matters, like really matters.
